header.title: Steam Mod Steamprofile Ajax On Viewmessage
header.description: Users that have entered in an Steam account will see a image under their avatar (stating if there online/offline or what game their playing) on the viewtopic page and when clicked on will take a user to the members Steam Profile also in the profile page above the signature but the image will be bigger.
header.author-notes:
Works on prosilver and subsilver2 styles.
To be able to use 'Steam Mod Steamprofile Ajax On Viewmessage' you must first install 'Steam Mod on Viewmessage'
This addon uses steamprofile(https://github.com/BarracudaATA/SteamProfile) i'm not the author of it but i have his permission to include it.
To use this mod you must have cURL enabled ask your host if you don't know.
